mentions.context: Answer sets are then computed by ASP solver Clingo [24] as the minimal sets of grounded atoms (i.e., with assignments of variables), hence including the shortest plans along with the corresponding environmental features.
The plan is computed based on available expert procedural knowledge, conveniently expressed in the declarative logic programming formalism of Answer Set Programming (ASP) [22], [23].
